name: HardBoiledFarm
description:
Ants invade a potato field in Gangwon-do!

You who have been recklessly spraying pesticides and killing animals and plants.

The ecosystem has risen to retaliate against you!

Collect random items and combine items, and combine again! And combine again!

Spend all your time looking for recipes! What if I turn off Recipe? Combine!

Slash the ant queen jackal and save the potato fields with the complete set of items!
